name: Loc8.com
tag_list: cmms, asset-management, job-management, scheduled-maintenance, reactive-maintenance, help-desk, inventory, purchasing
overview:
Loc8.com is an Asset Centric CMMS (Computerised Maintenance Management System) that can deliver a solution from a 2 person company to a 5000 person company with full scalability and deployment options making it affordable for customers as they grow and expand. We provide the value of job management systems while integrating strategic asset management standards to maximise the value of our customers assets from procurement to disposal.

Loc8.com delivers an online and offline solution in conjunction with web based in-field applications forC Windows, Android, iPad/iPhone (IOS) and Windows Mobile platforms. It is a feature-rich software platform integrated with existing ERP or financial systems extended into the field on any available mobile hardware technology. In simple terms Loc8 fits into our customers often complex technology environments rather than drive hardware technology purchasing decisions.
